summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Alder Street, from the east line of Twenty-ninth Avenue to the west line of Thirtieth Avenue, and from the east line of Thirtieth Avenue to the east line of Thirty-first Avenue; East Terrace Street, from the east line of Thirtieth Avenue to the east line of Thirty-first Avenue; Thirty-first Avenue, from East Alder Street to East Terrace Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt, or granite blocks, or sandstone blocks, if the grade is too steep for asphalt, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 32417, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
